I have played this game for 3700h+ and this game has accompanied me from junior high school to senior high school. Sometimes I can play all day. It feels really good to training myself and discussing strategies with the team.We created a very effective strategies "fastest b-short".Thanks to everyone in the team.As a senior of this game, I just wanna say: this game is so fucking awesome. Met a lot of people from all over the world. Its normal to meet and break up friendships in this game, please dont take it to heart. I dont allow anyone who hasn't played csgo before. Thank u for reading my comments xd
